item.title: MIUI OS1.0.11.0.ULCCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12 China

Codename: cupid

Version: OS1.0.11.0.ULCCNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.2 GB

MD5: 7c59b533aa8847960ce4ce2cced5aa46

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
[Other improvements and optimizations]
With this update, Mi Protect will be turned on automatically. It will check apps during installation, block risky apps, and keep your system safe.

Download: Here
